SELECT S.seq , S.sale_date AS saleDate , S.sale_flag AS saleFlag , S.fabric_seq AS fabricSeq , F.fabric_no AS fabricNo , F.fabric_name AS fabricName , S.section , S.color , S.fabric_count AS fabricCount , S.deduction , S.unit , S.price , S.tax , S.delivery , S.receivable , S.etc , S.order_no AS orderNo , M.name AS registerName , S.register_id AS registerId , S.register_date AS registerDate FROM sales S INNER JOIN member M ON S.register_id = M.id INNER JOIN fabric F ON S.fabric_seq = F.seq WHERE 1 = 1
AND S.sale_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00')
ORDER BY S.sale_date ASC

SELECT F.seq , F.collect_date AS collectDate , F.collect_type AS collectType , F.price AS price , M.name AS registerName , F.register_id AS registerId , F.register_date AS registerDate , F.state AS state FROM collect F INNER JOIN member M ON F.register_id = M.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND state = '0'
AND F.collect_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00')
ORDER BY F.seq ASC

SELECT SUM(section) AS section , SUM(fabric_count) AS fabricCount , SUM(deduction) AS deduction , SUM(unit) AS unit , SUM(price) AS price , SUM(tax) AS tax FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND sale_flag = #{saleFlag}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price), 0) AS collectTotalPrice FROM collect WHERE collect_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00')

SELECT yyyyMM , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS sellTotal , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'purchase' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS purchaseTotal , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) * 0.85 AS percent , ((MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) * 0.85) - MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'purchase' THEN total ELSE 0 END)) AS emptyPrice FROM ( SELECT LEFT(sell_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , 'sell' AS salesType , SUM(price) AS total FROM sell WHERE sell_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{year}, '-01-01 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{year}, '-12-31 23:59:59') GROUP BY LEFT(sell_date, 7)
UNION ALL
SELECT LEFT(purchase_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , 'purchase' AS salesType , SUM(total) AS total FROM purchase WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{year}, '-01-01 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{year}, '-12-31 23:59:59') GROUP BY LEFT(purchase_date, 7) ) cal GROUP BY yyyyMM

SELECT SUM(sellTotal) AS sellTotal , SUM(purchaseTotal) AS purchaseTotal , SUM(percent) AS percent , SUM(emptyPrice) AS emptyPrice FROM ( SELECT yyyyMM , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS sellTotal , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'purchase' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS purchaseTotal , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) * 0.85 AS percent , ((MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) * 0.85) - MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'purchase' THEN total ELSE 0 END)) AS emptyPrice FROM ( SELECT LEFT(sell_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , 'sell' AS salesType , SUM(price) AS total FROM sell WHERE sell_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{year}, '-01-01 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{year}, '-12-31 23:59:59') GROUP BY LEFT(sell_date, 7)
UNION ALL
SELECT LEFT(purchase_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , 'purchase' AS salesType , SUM(total) AS total FROM purchase WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{year}, '-01-01 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{year}, '-12-31 23:59:59') GROUP BY LEFT(purchase_date, 7) ) cal GROUP BY yyyyMM ) summary

SELECT yyyyMM , companyName , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS sellTotal , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'purchase' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS purchaseTotal FROM ( SELECT LEFT(S.sell_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , C.company_name AS companyName , 'sell' AS salesType , SUM(S.price) AS total FROM sell S INNER JOIN company C ON S.company_seq = C.seq WHERE S.sell_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00') GROUP BY LEFT(S.sell_date, 7), companyName
UNION ALL
SELECT LEFT(P.purchase_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , C.company_name AS companyName , 'purchase' AS salesType , SUM(P.total) AS total FROM purchase P INNER JOIN company C ON P.company_seq = C.seq WHERE P.purchase_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00') GROUP BY LEFT(P.purchase_date, 7), companyName ) cal GROUP BY yyyyMM, companyName

SELECT SUM(sellTotal) AS sellTotal , SUM(purchaseTotal) AS purchaseTotal FROM ( SELECT yyyyMM , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'sell' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS sellTotal , MAX(CASE WHEN salesType = 'purchase' THEN total ELSE 0 END) AS purchaseTotal FROM ( SELECT LEFT(sell_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , 'sell' AS salesType , SUM(price) AS total FROM sell WHERE sell_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00') GROUP BY LEFT(sell_date, 7)
UNION ALL
SELECT LEFT(purchase_date, 7) AS yyyyMM , 'purchase' AS salesType , SUM(total) AS total FROM purchase WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{finishDate}, ' 00:00:00') GROUP BY LEFT(purchase_date, 7) ) cal GROUP BY yyyyMM ) summary
